chapter.title: Configuration
chapter.para: Apart from the maven dependency configuration, most of the configuration options of the printing plugin are currently provided by the end user at runtime. To provide access to the plugin's functionality from the client GWT, an action has been provided that pops up a printing preferences window.

section.title: Dependencies
